content.text: Welcome! In this lesson, you'll learn how to describe your home in Italian, from where you live to what it's like.

data.tip: The 'qu' sound is like 'kw' in 'queen'. The 'ie' is a single sound, like 'ye' in 'yes'.

content.text: To say where you live, use `abito a` for a city (a Roma) and `abito in` for a type of home (in una casa).
Italian adjectives change based on gender. Use `solo` for masculine and `sola` for feminine.

content.title: Basic Information
content.setting: You're chatting with your Italian colleague, Marco, who asks about where you live.

extract_info.user_location: Extract the city or neighborhood the user lives in.

conversation_flow.title: State your type of home
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, {user_location}! E abiti in una casa o in un appartamento?

extract_info.user_home_type: Extract if the user lives in a house (casa) or apartment (appartamento).

conversation_flow.title: Say who you live with
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Capito. Abiti da solo/a o con qualcuno?

content.text: Great start! Now let's learn how to add more detail about the space.
To make a verb negative, just add `non` before it. For example, `ho` (I have) becomes `non ho` (I don't have).

content.title: Describing the Space
content.setting: The conversation continues. Marco is curious about the details of your home.

conversation_flow.title: Say how many rooms your home has
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Interessante! E quante stanze ha il tuo {user_home_type}?

conversation_flow.title: Mention one room you like
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ok. E hai una stanza preferita?

conversation_flow.title: State if you have a garden or a balcony
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Bello! Hai anche un giardino o un balcone?

content.text: Excellent! Finally, let's learn how to share your opinion and ask about his home.
Remember to match your adjectives! `Il mio appartamento è luminoso`. `La mia casa è luminosa`.
`E tu?` is a simple and very common way to ask a question back to someone.

content.title: Expressing Your Opinion
content.setting: You're ready to share your opinion about your home and turn the question back to Marco.

conversation_flow.title: Say that you are happy with your home
Ask them about their living situation
Listen to the response
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Io abito in un piccolo appartamento, ma è molto comodo. Grazie per la conversazione!
